messages.speech: BHMS or Bachelor of Homeopathic Medicine and Surgery  is an undergraduate academic degree course which covers medical knowledge of the homeopathic system. BHMS course is of 5Â½ year duration which includes an internship. The course can be pursued after completion of 10+2 level of education with 50% marks in aggregate. Admission to the program is based on entrance exams like NEET, KEAM etc. For more information about the colleges providing the course, you can visit- https://collegedunia.com/courses/bachelor-of-homeopathic-medicine-and-surgery-bhms
